title: China Drugmakers Face Pressure to Prove Their Covid-19 Vaccines Work
sub_head: The companies haven’t released results of late-stage trials while data from Western drugmakers show three candidates to be highly promising
body:
TAIPEI—Pressure is mounting on Chinese drugmakers to show clinical evidence that their leading Covid-19 vaccines work, after early data on three Western-developed shots showed promising effectiveness against the disease.
Earlier this week, AstraZeneca PLC and the University of Oxford said their vaccine candidate was anywhere between 62% to 90% effective, joining two other Western vaccine rivals in providing data. The results could allow the U.S. and other countries to grant regulatory authorization and gear up distribution...
